rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a defined risk-adjective.
statement_text: The spread of bird flu has raised concerns among governments and the poultry industry after it [the spread of bird flu] ravaged flocks around the world over the past few years, disrupting supply, fuelling food prices and raising the risk of human transmission.

The spread of bird flu has raised concerns among governments and the poultry industry after it [the spread of bird flu] ravaged flocks around the world over the past few years, disrupting supply, fuelling food prices and raising the risk of human transmission.
